abilities.name: Sullen Malevolence
abilities.rule: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, if this unit contains one or more **BLUE HORROR** models, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that enemy unit by 1.

abilities.name: Exploding Horrors
abilities.rule: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one or more **BRIMSTONE HORROR** models in this unit. For each **BRIMSTONE HORROR** model you select, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model is destroyed and that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.rule: Each time a **BLUE HORROR** model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, add one **BRIMSTONE HORROR** model to this unit.
